sentences.en: A swine over fat is the cause of his own bane.
Avarice is the bane to happiness.
sentences.cn: 贪婪是损毁幸福的祸根.

sentences.en: Drink was the bane of his existence.
He has been the bane of my life.
Her brother is the bane of her life .
sentences.cn: 她弟弟是她生活中的灾星。

sentences.en: Mandarin lessons were the Bane of an otherwise happy school life.
sentences.cn: 我的学校生活大体上蛮快乐,唯一令我不快的就是上华文课.

sentences.en: My strength His bane and I will never give in.
sentences.cn: 我的力量、他的破坏、而我将永不放弃.

sentences.en: Rain is the bane of holiday-makers.
Sagoro's greatest bane was his criminal older brother, Venco.
sentences.cn: 萨戈罗最大的祸根就是他的罪犯哥哥文科.

sentences.en: She is the bane of his life.
Spots can be the bane of a teenager's life.
sentences.cn: 粉刺会给青少年带来无尽的烦恼。

sentences.en: That car is always breaking down! It's the bane of my life.
sentences.cn: 这车老是抛锚! 真是我的祸根.

sentences.en: The neighbours' kids are the bane of my life .
sentences.cn: 街坊邻居的孩子让我生活得很不安宁。

sentences.en: Those noisy neighbours are the bane of my life.
sentences.cn: 那些吵吵闹闹的邻居成了我生活中的一大忧患.

sentences.en: University reform had long been his bugbear, and now was his bane.
sentences.cn: 大学改革早就是使他头痛的事情， 如今更成为他的祸害了。

sentences.en: We must beware of the bane that the Tao of sage caused.
sentences.cn: 因此,我们对圣人之道所带给我们的祸害,一定要小心谨慎以对.

sentences.en: You really are the bane of my life!
sentences.cn: 真真你就是我命中的`天魔星'!

words.tran_cn: 有害的；有毒的；使人苦恼的

trans.tran_cn: 有害的； 使人苦恼的
灾星，祸根，烦人的事，使某人的生活不快（或不幸）的原因
trans.tran_en: something that causes trouble or makes people unhappy
